casebody.data:
PIRO
v.
PIRO. No. 108P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Karen Shapiro, Huntersville, for Piro, Karen Shapiro. Gena Graham Morris, Charlotte, for Piro, Michael C. Mr. Christopher Thomas Hood, Charlotte, for Piro, Michael C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of May 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
